trans-unit.source: File objects may be obtained from a FileList object returned as a result of a user selecting files using the <input> element, from a drag and drop operation's DataTransfer object, or from the mozGetAsFile() API on an HTMLCanvasElement.
trans-unit.target: 文件对象可以从用户使用 <input> 元素选择文件后返回的 FileList 对象，拖放操作的 DataTransfer 对象或 mozGetAsFile() 上的 HTMLCanvasElement （） API 获得。

trans-unit.source: Fill and stroke styles
trans-unit.target: 填充和描边风格

trans-unit.source: Fill each output channel with its input counterpart, that is the input channel with the same index. Channels with no corresponding input channels are left silent.
trans-unit.target: 用它的输入对应通道填充每个输出通道,即具有相同索引的输入通道。没有对应输入通道的通道则保持沉默。

trans-unit.source: Fill each output channel with its input counterpart, that is the input channel with the same index. Input channels with no corresponding output channels are dropped.
trans-unit.target: 用它的输入对应通道填充每个输出通道,即具有相同索引的输入通道。没有对应输出通道的输入通道将被放弃。

trans-unit.source: Fill mode: none
trans-unit.target: 填充模式:无

trans-unit.source: Fill styling is used for colors and styles inside shapes and stroke styling is used for the lines around shapes.
trans-unit.target: 填充造型用于形状内部的颜色和样式,描边造型用于形状周围的线条。

trans-unit.source: Filling a blank ImageData object
trans-unit.target: 填充一个空白的ImageData对象

trans-unit.source: Filling a rectangle
trans-unit.target: 填充一个矩形

trans-unit.source: Filling a rectangle with a linear gradient
trans-unit.target: 用线性渐变填充矩形。

trans-unit.source: Filling a rectangle with a radial gradient
trans-unit.target: 用径向梯度填充矩形。

trans-unit.source: Filling the whole canvas
trans-unit.target: 填充整个画布

trans-unit.source: Fills a given text at the given (x,y) position. Optionally with a maximum width to draw.
trans-unit.target: 在给定的(x,y)位置上填充一个给定的文本。可以选择最大宽度来绘制。

trans-unit.source: Fills an additional triangular area between the common endpoint of connected segments, and the separate outside rectangular corners of each segment.
trans-unit.target: 在连接段的公共端点和每个段的独立外侧矩形角之间填充一个额外的三角形区域。

trans-unit.source: Fills the passed TypedArray with cryptographically sound random values.
trans-unit.target: 用加密的声音随机值填充传递的 TypedArray 。

trans-unit.source: Fills the subpaths with the current fill style.
trans-unit.target: 用当前的填充样式填充子路径。

trans-unit.source: Filter functions
trans-unit.target: 过滤功能

trans-unit.source: FilterElement
trans-unit.target: FilterElement

trans-unit.source: FilterPrimitiveStandardAttributes
trans-unit.target: FilterPrimitiveStandardAttributes

trans-unit.source: Filtering the results using array methods
trans-unit.target: 使用数组方法过滤结果

trans-unit.source: Finale
trans-unit.target: Finale

trans-unit.source: Finally a fun step to show how matrices work is to reverse the steps to bring the matrix back to the original identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 最后一个有趣的步骤是展示矩阵的工作原理,就是把步骤反过来,让矩阵回到原来的身份矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Finally a projection (in our case the perspective matrix) needs to be added. This final step will move it into clip space.
trans-unit.target: 最后需要添加一个投影(在我们的例子中是透视矩阵)。这最后一步将把它移到剪辑空间。

trans-unit.source: Finally a single model matrix is set that represents the transformations that will be performed on each position that makes up the model to move it into the correct space. In this case, for every frame of the animation a series of scale, rotation, and translation matrices move the data into the desired spot in clip space. The cube is the size of clip space (-1,-1,-1) to (1,1,1) so it will need to be shrunk down to fit. This matrix is sent directly to the shader, having been multiplied in JavaScript beforehand.
trans-unit.target: 最后设置一个单一的模型矩阵,它表示将对组成模型的每个位置进行变换,以将其移动到正确的空间中。在这种情况下,对于动画的每一帧,一系列的比例、旋转和转换矩阵将数据移动到剪辑空间中的所需位置。立方体是剪辑空间(-1,-1,-1)到(1,1,1)的大小,所以需要将其缩小以适应。这个矩阵是直接发送到着色器的,事先已经在JavaScript中进行了乘法。

trans-unit.source: Finally comes the main body. We start with an empty <main> element here. This box will be populated using script later.
trans-unit.target: 最后是主体。我们从一个空的 <main> 元素开始。稍后将使用脚本填充此框。

trans-unit.source: Finally for demonstration that clipping is actually going on, this box doesn't get drawn because it's outside of clip space. The depth is outside of the -1.0 to 1.0 range.
trans-unit.target: 最后为了演示剪裁是否真的在进行,这个方框没有被绘制,因为它在剪裁空间之外。深度在-1.0到1.0的范围之外。

trans-unit.source: Finally for each of the examples we will generate a 4x4 matrix, then update the <div>'s style to have a transform applied to it, set to a matrix3d. Bear in mind that even though the matrix is made up of 4 rows and 4 columns, it collapses into a single line of 16 values.
trans-unit.target: 最后，对于每个示例，我们将生成一个4x4矩阵，然后更新 <div> 的样式以对其应用转换，并将其设置为 matrix3d 。请记住，即使矩阵由4行4列组成，它也会折叠为16个值的单行。

trans-unit.source: Finally for this section, we set up the basic getUserMedia structure:
trans-unit.target: 最后，在本节中，我们设置了基本的 getUserMedia 结构：

trans-unit.source: Finally, animateScene() is called to render the first frame and schedule the rendering of the next frame of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 最后， animateScene() 渲染第一帧，并安排动画下一帧的渲染。

trans-unit.source: Finally, srcObject is set to null to sever the link to the MediaStream object so it can be released.
trans-unit.target: 最后，将 srcObject 设置为 null 以切断与 MediaStream 对象的链接，以便可以将其释放。

trans-unit.source: Finally, a message is sent to the worker to start it.
trans-unit.target: 最后,向工人发送消息,启动它。

trans-unit.source: Finally, after creating our biquad filter, we use getFrequencyResponse() to generate the response data and put it in our arrays, then loop through each data set and output them in a human-readable list at the bottom of the page:
trans-unit.target: 最后，在创建了 getFrequencyResponse() 滤波器之后，我们使用getFrequencyResponse（）生成响应数据并将其放入我们的数组中，然后遍历每个数据集并将其输出到页面底部的人类可读列表中：

trans-unit.source: Finally, after creating our filter, we use getFrequencyResponse() to generate the response data and put it in our arrays, then loop through each data set and output them in a human-readable list at the bottom of the page:
trans-unit.target: 最后，在创建过滤器之后，我们使用 getFrequencyResponse() 生成响应数据并将其放入我们的数组中，然后遍历每个数据集并在页面底部的人类可读列表中输出它们：

trans-unit.source: Finally, append each child according to the table structure (as in the above figure). The following source code is a commented version for the sample1.html.
trans-unit.target: 最后,根据表格结构追加每个子代(如上图)。下面的源代码是sample1.html的注释版本。

trans-unit.source: Finally, back in the main script, we deal with the message (again, you'll see similar constructs in both multiply.js and square.js):
trans-unit.target: 最后，回到主脚本中，我们处理消息（同样，你会看到两个类似的结构multiply.js和square.js）：

trans-unit.source: Finally, global variables that will be used when constructing waveforms are created:
trans-unit.target: 最后,创建构建波形时要用到的全局变量。

trans-unit.source: Finally, if there's at least one element to redraw, we use requestAnimationFrame() to schedule a function that will redraw each element in the redrawList during the next animation frame.
trans-unit.target: 最后，如果至少有一个要重绘的元素，我们使用 requestAnimationFrame() 安排一个函数，该函数将在下一个动画帧期间重绘 redrawList 中的每个元素。

trans-unit.source: Finally, in order to track whether the intersection ratio is going up or down, we remember the current ratio in the variable prevRatio.
trans-unit.target: 最后，为了跟踪交叉比率是上升还是下降，我们记得变量 prevRatio 中的当前比率。

trans-unit.source: Finally, let's connect all our nodes and start the oscillator!
trans-unit.target: 最后,让我们连接所有的节点,并启动振荡器!

trans-unit.source: Finally, let's replace our variable squareRotation by cubeRotation and add a second rotation around the x axis:
trans-unit.target: 最后，让我们用 cubeRotation 替换变量 squareRotation ，并绕x轴添加第二个旋转：

trans-unit.source: Finally, let's take a look at the JavaScript code that uses the Intersection Observer API to make things happen.
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们来看看使用交集观察者API来实现的JavaScript代码。

trans-unit.source: Finally, pass the MediaStreamTrack object to the ImageCapture.ImageCapture() constructor. Though a MediaStream holds several types of tracks and provides multiple methods for retrieving them, the ImageCapture constructor will throw a DOMException of type NotSupportedError if MediaStreamTrack.kind is not "video".
trans-unit.target: 最后，将 MediaStreamTrack 对象传递给 ImageCapture.ImageCapture() 构造函数。尽管 MediaStream 拥有几种类型的轨道并提供了多种检索方法，但是如果 MediaStreamTrack.kind 不是 "video" ，则ImageCapture构造函数将抛出 NotSupportedError 类型的 DOMException 。

trans-unit.source: Finally, return whatever the custom response ended up being equal to, using FetchEvent.respondWith.
trans-unit.target: 最后，使用 FetchEvent.respondWith 返回自定义响应最终等于的结果。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the "hangup-button" <button>, to disconnect from a call, is defined and configured to start disabled (setting this as our default for when no call is connected) and apply the function hangUpCall() on click. This function's role is to close the call, and send a signalling server notification to the other peer, requesting it also close.
trans-unit.target: 最后，定义了与通话断开连接的“ hangup-button ” <button> ，并将其配置为禁用开始（将其设置为无电话时的默认设置），并在单击时应用 hangUpCall() 函数。该功能的作用是关闭呼叫，并向另一个对等方发送信令服务器通知，请求也将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the IDBDatabase object representing the database connection receives a close event. You can use the IDBDatabase.onclose event handler to listen for these events, so that you know when a database is unexpectedly closed.
trans-unit.target: 最后，代表数据库连接的 IDBDatabase 对象收到 close 事件。您可以使用 IDBDatabase.onclose 事件处理程序来侦听这些事件，以便知道数据库意外关闭的时间。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the dragleave event will fire at an element when the drag leaves the element. This is the time when you should remove any insertion markers or highlighting. You do not need to cancel this event. Any highlighting or other visual effects specified using the -moz-drag-over pseudoclass will be removed automatically. The dragleave event will always fire, even if the drag is cancelled, so you can always ensure that any insertion point cleanup can be done during this event.
trans-unit.target: 最后，当拖动离开元素时， dragleave 事件将在该元素上触发。这是您应该删除所有插入标记或突出显示的时间。您无需取消此事件。使用 -moz-drag-over 伪类指定的任何突出显示或其他视觉效果将自动删除。该 dragleave 事件总是会火，即使拖到被取消，所以你总是可以确保任何插入点的清理可以在此活动期间进行。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the addEventListener() method is used to start listening for keydown events, acting on each key by updating the ship position and rotation angle, then calling refresh() to draw the ship at its new position and angle.
trans-unit.target: 最后， addEventListener() 方法用于为开始听 keydown 事件，作用于每个键通过更新船舶位置和旋转角度，然后调用 refresh() 在新的位置和角度来绘制了船。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the width and height of both the video and the canvas are set to match each other by calling Element.setAttribute() on each of the two properties on each element, and setting widths and heights as appropriate. Finally, we set the streaming variable to true to prevent us from inadvertently running this setup code again.
trans-unit.target: 最后，通过在每个元素的两个属性中的每个属性上调用 Element.setAttribute() 并适当地设置宽度和高度，将视频和画布的 width 和 height 设置为彼此匹配。最后，我们将 streaming 变量设置为 true ,以防止我们再次无意中运行此安装代码。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the ads have the following initial styling. Individual ads may customize the style somewhat, as we'll see later.
trans-unit.target: 最后,广告的初始样式如下。个别广告可能会对风格进行一定的自定义,我们后面会看到。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the compiled program is returned to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 最后,编译后的程序返回给调用者。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the compiled shader is returned to the caller (which is the buildShaderProgram() function.
trans-unit.target: 最后，将已编译的着色器返回给调用方（即 buildShaderProgram() 函数）。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the following transformation methods allow modifications directly to the transformation matrix.
trans-unit.target: 最后,以下变换方法可以直接修改变换矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the last-viewed time for the ad is updated to the current time. This is done whether the ad was running when this function was called or not; this causes the ad's timer to always be running when this function returns. This makes sense because this function is only called if the ad is visible, even if it's just now become visible.
trans-unit.target: 最后,广告的最后浏览时间被更新为当前时间。无论这个函数被调用时广告是否在运行,都会这样做;这导致这个函数返回时,广告的定时器始终在运行。这是有意义的,因为这个函数只有在广告可见时才会被调用,即使它现在刚刚变得可见。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the local connection's remote description is set to refer to the remote peer by calling localConnection's RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription().
trans-unit.target: 最后，通过调用localConnection的 RTCPeerConnection.setRemoteDescription() 将本地连接的远程描述设置为引用远程对等方。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the new value of enabled is saved, making the change take effect.
trans-unit.target: 最后，保存新的 enabled 值，使更改生效。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the oscillator list is initialized to ensure that it's ready to receive information identifiying which oscillators are associated with which keys.
trans-unit.target: 最后,振荡器列表被初始化,以确保它已准备好接收识别哪些振荡器与哪些键相关联的信息。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the track's applyConstraints() method is called to configure the API as desired by specifying the values or ranges of values it wishes to use for any of the constrainable properties about which it has a preference.
trans-unit.target: 最后，调用轨道的 applyConstraints() 方法，通过指定希望用于其具有偏好的任何可约束属性的值或值范围，来根据需要配置API。

trans-unit.source: Finally, the uniform uGlobalColor is set to the color [0.1, 0.7, 0.2, 1.0], the components in this 4-component vector represent the values of red, green, blue, and alpha, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 最后，将统一的 uGlobalColor 设置为颜色 [0.1, 0.7, 0.2, 1.0] 0.1、0.7、0.2、1.0 ]，此4分量向量中的分量分别表示红色，绿色，蓝色和alpha的值。

trans-unit.source: Finally, there's the little box into which we'll insert the messages. This <div> block will be the second peer.
trans-unit.target: 最后，有一个小盒子，我们将在其中插入消息。此 <div> 块将是第二个同级。

trans-unit.source: Finally, this example creates a new RTCPeerConnection which will use one of two servers for ICE negotiation. Each server can have one or more URLs, as demonstrated above.
trans-unit.target: 最后，此示例创建一个新的 RTCPeerConnection ，它将使用两个服务器之一进行ICE协商。如上所述，每个服务器可以具有一个或多个URL。

trans-unit.source: Finally, track the mouse's position. Use 2 rotation matrices to have the camera look up and down based on where the user's mouse is on the screen.
trans-unit.target: 最后,跟踪鼠标的位置。使用2个旋转矩阵,让摄像头根据用户的鼠标在屏幕上的位置上下看。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we append the new item to the <ul> that contains all of the user names.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们将新项目追加到包含所有用户名的 <ul> 上。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we call blur() on the text input. This is mainly to hide the keyboard on Firefox OS.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们在文本输入上调用blur（）。这主要是为了在Firefox OS上隐藏键盘。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we call getUserMedia() to obtain access to the caller's microphone. If successful, the function gotStream() is called, otherwise we log the error because calling has failed.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们调用 getUserMedia() 获得对呼叫者麦克风的访问权限。如果成功，则调用函数 gotStream() ，否则将记录错误，因为调用失败。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we chain a .catch() function onto the end that will run if the promise is rejected.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们将 .catch() 函数链接到最后一个被拒绝的承诺将运行的函数。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we connect all the gain nodes to the AudioContext's destination, so that any sound delivered to the gain nodes will reach the output, whether that output be speakers, headphones, a recording stream, or any other destination type.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们将所有增益节点连接到 AudioContext 的 destination ，以便传递到增益节点的任何声音都将到达输出，无论该输出是扬声器，耳机，录音流还是任何其他目标类型。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we finish the line in the middle of the right hand side of the canvas, then draw the stroke we've defined:
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们在画布右侧的中间完成线条,然后画出我们定义的笔触。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we get the second item from the list of p elements via
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们从p元素列表中得到第二项,通过

trans-unit.source: Finally, we iterate through each record, and insert the data into an HTML table. For a complete working example, see our IDBIndex-example demo repo (View the example live.)
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们遍历每条记录，然后将数据插入HTML表中。有关完整的工作示例，请参阅我们的IDBIndex-example演示存储库（实时查看示例）。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we iterate through each record, and insert the data into an HTML table. For a complete working example, see our IDBIndex-example demo repo (View the example live.)
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们遍历每条记录，然后将数据插入HTML表中。有关完整的工作示例，请参阅我们的IDBIndex-example演示存储库（实时查看示例）。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we iterate through each record, and insert the data into an HTML table. For a complete working example, see our IDBIndex-example demo repo (View the example live.)

trans-unit.source: Finally, we iterate through each record, inserting the data into an HTML table. For a complete working example, see our IDBIndex-example demo repo (View the example live).
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们遍历每条记录，然后将数据插入HTML表中。有关完整的工作示例，请参阅我们的IDBIndex-example演示存储库（实时查看示例）。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we need to update the code that builds the uniform matrices to generate and deliver to the shader a normal matrix, which is used to transform the normals when dealing with the current orientation of the cube in relation to the light source:
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们需要更新构建统一矩阵的代码，以生成法线矩阵并将其传递给着色器，该法线矩阵用于在处理立方体相对于光源的当前方向时转换法线：

trans-unit.source: Finally, we return GamepadPose.hasPosition and GamepadPose.hasOrientation to show whether the controller can return position and orientation data. This works just the same as for the displays, except that in the case of gamepads these values are available on the pose object, not the capabilities object.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们返回 GamepadPose.hasPosition 和 GamepadPose.hasOrientation 来显示控制器是否可以返回位置和方向数据。除了在游戏手柄的情况下，这些值在姿势对象（而不是功能对象）上可用之外，其工作原理与显示器相同。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we set an onclick handler on the delete button to be a function that deletes the whole clip HTML structure.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们将Delete按钮上的 onclick 处理程序设置为删除整个剪辑HTML结构的函数。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we set the SpeechSynthesisUtterance.pitch and SpeechSynthesisUtterance.rate to the values of the relevant range form elements. Then, with all necessary preparations made, we start the utterance being spoken by invoking SpeechSynthesis.speak(), passing it the SpeechSynthesisUtterance instance as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们将 SpeechSynthesisUtterance.pitch 和 SpeechSynthesisUtterance.rate 设置为相关范围表单元素的值。然后，在进行所有必要的准备工作之后，我们通过调用 SpeechSynthesis.speak() 并开始将语音传递给它，并将 SpeechSynthesisUtterance 实例作为参数进行传递。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we set the disabled property to true on the "Hang Up" button, making it unclickable while there is no call underway; then we set targetUsername to null since we're no longer talking to anyone. This allows the user to call another user, or to receive an incoming call.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们在“挂断”按钮上将 disabled 属性设置为 true ，从而在没有通话进行时无法单击；然后我们将 targetUsername 设置为 null ,因为我们不再与任何人交谈。这使用户可以呼叫另一个用户，或接听来电。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we set the DTMF sender's ontonechange event handler so we get notified each time a DTMF tone finishes playing.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们设置DTMF发送者的 ontonechange 事件处理程序，以便每次播放DTMF音调时都得到通知。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we set the ID of the <div> which will show the timer we'll present in the ad to show how long it's been visible, giving it the class "timer". The initial text is set to "0:00", to represent the starting time of 0 minutes and 0 seconds, and it's appended to the ad.
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们设置 <div> 的ID，该ID 将显示要在广告中显示的计时器，以显示该计时器可见的时间，并为其指定 "timer" 类。初始文本设置为“ 0:00”，以表示0分钟0秒的开始时间，并将其附加到广告中。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we set the current contents of the two constraint set editor elements to the defaults.
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们将两个约束集编辑器元素的当前内容设置为默认值。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we set up a couple of variables for other items:
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们为其他项目设置了几个变量。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we set up a handler for a click on the button that runs the animation:
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们为点击运行动画的按钮设置一个处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we set up an interval which triggers once a second to handle any necessary refreshing. We need a one second refresh since we're displaying timers in all visible ads for the purposes of this example. You may not need an interval at all, or you might do it differently or using a different time interval.
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们设置一个每秒钟触发一次的时间间隔来处理任何必要的刷新。我们需要一秒钟刷新一次,因为在这个例子中,我们在所有可见的广告中显示定时器。你可能根本不需要间隔,或者你可能会以不同的方式或使用不同的时间间隔来做。

trans-unit.source: Finally, we update the button text so that the next time it is pressed, it will stop presentation to the VR display.
trans-unit.target: 最后,我们更新按钮文字,使其下次被按下时,会停止向VR显示屏呈现。

trans-unit.source: Finally, when the content is loaded the XMLHttpRequest function send() is called to upload the file's content.
trans-unit.target: 最后，在加载内容时， send() 调用 XMLHttpRequest 函数send（）来上传文件的内容。

trans-unit.source: Finds the Cache entry whose key is the request, returning a Promise that resolves to true if a matching Cache entry is found and deleted. If no Cache entry is found, the promise resolves to false.

trans-unit.source: Firebug
trans-unit.target: Firebug

trans-unit.source: Fired after pointer capture is released for a pointer.
trans-unit.target: 指针捕获后释放指针后触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired for several reasons including: pointing device is moved out of the hit test boundaries of an element; firing the pointerup event for a device that does not support hover (see pointerup); after firing the pointercancel event (see pointercancel); when a pen stylus leaves the hover range detectable by the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: 触发的原因有以下几种：将指示设备移出元素的命中测试边界；为不支持悬停的设备触发指标事件（请参见pointerup）；触发pointercancel事件后（请参见pointercancel）；当笔针离开悬停范围时，可由数字化仪检测到。

trans-unit.source: Fired when a JavaScript Promise is rejected but there is no rejection handler to deal with the rejection.
trans-unit.target: 当JavaScript Promise 被拒绝但没有拒绝处理程序来处理拒绝时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when a JavaScript Promise is rejected, and after the rejection is handled by the promise's rejection handling code.
trans-unit.target: 在拒绝JavaScript Promise 时以及在Promise的拒绝处理代码处理拒绝之后触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when a drag operation is being ended (for example, by releasing a mouse button or hitting the escape key). (See Finishing a Drag.)
trans-unit.target: 当拖动操作结束时触发（例如，通过释放鼠标按钮或按下逃逸键）。（请参阅完成拖动。）

trans-unit.source: Fired when a dragged element or text selection enters a valid drop target. (See Specifying Drop Targets.)
trans-unit.target: 当拖动的元素或文本选择输入有效的放置目标时触发。 （请参阅指定放置目标。）

trans-unit.source: Fired when a dragged element or text selection leaves a valid drop target.
trans-unit.target: 当拖动的元素或文本选区离开有效的下拉目标时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when a paused utterance is resumed.
trans-unit.target: 当暂停的语句被恢复时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when a pointer becomes active.
trans-unit.target: 当指针变为活动状态时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when a pointer changes coordinates.
trans-unit.target: 指针改变坐标时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when a pointer is no longer active.
trans-unit.target: 当指针不再活动时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when a pointing device is moved into an element's hit test boundaries.
trans-unit.target: 将定点设备移入元素的点击测试边界时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when a pointing device is moved into the hit test boundaries of an element or one of its descendants, including as a result of a pointerdown event from a device that does not support hover (see pointerdown).
trans-unit.target: 当指针设备移入元素或其后代之一的命中测试边界时触发，包括由于不支持悬停的设备发出的指标下降事件（请参见pointerdown）。

trans-unit.source: Fired when a pointing device is moved out of the hit test boundaries of an element. For pen devices, this event is fired when the stylus leaves the hover range detectable by the digitizer.
trans-unit.target: 将定点设备移出元素的点击测试边界时触发。对于笔式设备，当手写笔离开数字化仪可检测到的悬停范围时，将触发此事件。

trans-unit.source: Fired when a presentation connection is established.
trans-unit.target: 建立演示连接时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when an element is no longer the drag operation's immediate selection target.
trans-unit.target: 当元素不再是拖动操作的直接选择目标时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when an element or text selection is being dragged over a valid drop target (every few hundred milliseconds).
trans-unit.target: 当元素或文本选区被拖动到有效的投掷目标上时触发(每隔几百毫秒)。

trans-unit.source: Fired when an element or text selection is being dragged.
trans-unit.target: 当元素或文本选区被拖动时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when an element or text selection is dropped on a valid drop target. (See Performing a Drop.)
trans-unit.target: 当元素或文本选择放置在有效放置目标上时触发。（请参阅执行放置。）

trans-unit.source: Fired when an element receives pointer capture.
trans-unit.target: 当元素收到指针捕获时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when an error occurs that prevents the utterance from being succesfully spoken.
trans-unit.target: 当发生错误,使语句无法顺利说出时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when the list of SpeechSynthesisVoice objects that would be returned by the SpeechSynthesis.getVoices() method has changed.
trans-unit.target: 当 SpeechSynthesis.getVoices() 方法将返回的 SpeechSynthesisVoice 对象列表更改时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when the spoken utterance reaches a named SSML "mark" tag.
trans-unit.target: 当口语语句达到一个命名的SSML "标记 "标签时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when the spoken utterance reaches a word or sentence boundary.
trans-unit.target: 当说话的语句到达一个词或句子的边界时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when the user starts dragging an element or text selection. (See Starting a Drag Operation.)
trans-unit.target: 当用户开始拖动元素或文本选择时触发。（请参阅开始拖动操作。）

trans-unit.source: Fired when the utterance has begun to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: 当开始说话时发射。

trans-unit.source: Fired when the utterance has finished being spoken.
trans-unit.target: 语句说完后发射。

trans-unit.source: Fired when the utterance is paused part way through.
trans-unit.target: 当该语句在中途暂停时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when there is a call to PresentationConnection.close().
trans-unit.target: 调用 PresentationConnection.close() 时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when there is a call to PresentationConnection.send().
trans-unit.target: 调用 PresentationConnection.send() 时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired when there is a call to PresentationConnection.terminate().
trans-unit.target: 调用 PresentationConnection.terminate() 时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever SourceBuffer.appendBuffer() method or the SourceBuffer.remove() completes. SourceBuffer.updating changes from true to false. This event is fired before onupdateend.
trans-unit.target: 每当 SourceBuffer.appendBuffer() 方法或 SourceBuffer.remove() 完成时触发。 SourceBuffer.updating 从 true 更改为 false 。在 onupdateend 之前触发此事件。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever SourceBuffer.appendBuffer() method or the SourceBuffer.remove() has ended. This event is fired after onupdate.
trans-unit.target: 每当 SourceBuffer.appendBuffer() 方法或 SourceBuffer.remove() 已结束时触发。此事件在 onupdate 之后触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever SourceBuffer.appendBuffer() or SourceBuffer.appendStream() is ended by a call to SourceBuffer.abort(). SourceBuffer.updating changes from true to false.
trans-unit.target: 每当 SourceBuffer.appendBuffer() 或 SourceBuffer.appendStream() 以对 SourceBuffer.abort() 的调用结束时触发。 SourceBuffer.updating 从 true 更改为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever a FontFaceSet loads.
trans-unit.target: 每当加载 FontFaceSet 时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever a controllerchange event occurs — when the document's associated ServiceWorkerRegistration acquires a new active worker.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生 controllerchange 事件时触发，即与文档关联的 ServiceWorkerRegistration 获取新的 active 工作程序时。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever a message event occurs — when incoming messages are received to the ServiceWorkerContainer object (e.g. via a MessagePort.postMessage() call.)
trans-unit.target: 每当发生 message 事件时就会触发-当收到传入到 ServiceWorkerContainer 对象的 MessagePort.postMessage() 例如，通过MessagePort.postMessage（）调用）。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever a new presentation connection becomes available.
trans-unit.target: 每当新的演示文稿连接可用时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever an error event occurs in the associated service workers.
trans-unit.target: 每当关联的服务工作者中发生 error 事件时，就会触发该事件。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever an error occurs during SourceBuffer.appendBuffer() or SourceBuffer.appendStream(). SourceBuffer.updating changes from true to false.
trans-unit.target: 在 SourceBuffer.appendBuffer() 或 SourceBuffer.appendStream() 期间发生错误时触发。 SourceBuffer.updating 从 true 更改为 false 。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever is the EventHandler called when the screen changes orientation.
trans-unit.target: 屏幕改变方向时，只要调用 EventHandler 就会触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever the ConstantSourceNode data has stopped playing.
trans-unit.target: 每当 ConstantSourceNode 数据停止播放时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fired whenever the value of SourceBuffer.updating transitions from false to true.
trans-unit.target: 每当 SourceBuffer.updating 的值从 false 转换为 true 时将触发。

trans-unit.source: Firefox 16 added a non-standard parameter to the constructor that can enable anonymous mode (see bug 692677). Setting the mozAnon flag to true effectively resembles the AnonXMLHttpRequest() constructor described in older versions of the XMLHttpRequest specification.

trans-unit.source: Firefox 5 note

trans-unit.source: Firefox 50 no longer throttles background tabs if a Web Audio API AudioContext is actively playing sound. Firefox 51 further amends this such that background tabs are no longer throttled if an AudioContext is present in the tab at all, even if no sound is being played. These resolve a number of issues with apps which play note-based music not being able to time or synchronize the music properly when the tab is in the background.
trans-unit.target: 如果Web Audio API AudioContext 正在主动播放声音，则Firefox 50将不再限制背景选项卡。Firefox 51对此进行了进一步修改，以使即使在根本没有声音播放的情况下，即使选项卡中存在 AudioContext ,也不会限制其背景选项卡。这些功能解决了一些问题，这些应用程序播放基于音符的音乐时，如果该选项卡在后台，则无法正确计时或同步音乐。

trans-unit.source: Firefox 55 outputs a warning to the console if a candidate MediaKeySystemConfiguration included in supportedConfigurations includes an audioCapabilities or videoCapabilities object whose value of contentType doesn't specify a "codecs" substring defining which codecs within the media wrapper format should be allowed.
trans-unit.target: 火狐55个输出警告到控制台如果候选 MediaKeySystemConfiguration 包括在 supportedConfigurations 包括 audioCapabilities 或 videoCapabilities 对象的其值 contentType 未指定 "codecs" 的子串，其限定包装格式在介质内的编解码器应该被允许。

trans-unit.source: Firefox accepts a string instead of an object here, but only from version 51 onwards. In version 50, options must be an object.

trans-unit.source: Firefox and Safari close notifications automatically after a few moments (around four seconds). This may also happen at the operating system level. Some browsers don't however, such as Chrome. To make sure that the notifications close in all browsers, you can call the Notification.close function inside a setTimeout() function to close the notification after 4 seconds. Also note the use of bind() to make sure the close() call is associated with the notification.
trans-unit.target: 几分钟（大约四秒钟）后，Firefox和Safari会自动关闭通知。这也可能在操作系统级别上发生。但是某些浏览器却没有，例如Chrome。为确保通知在所有浏览器中都关闭，您可以在 setTimeout() 函数内调用 Notification.close 函数以在4秒后关闭通知。还要注意使用 bind() 来确保 close() 调用与通知相关联。

trans-unit.source: Firefox compatibility notes
trans-unit.target: 火狐兼容性说明

trans-unit.source: Firefox currently handles the value null incorrectly. Instead of producing a node that generates a single channel of silence, the node becomes unusable and will be ignored if you attempt to connect it to anything.
trans-unit.target: Firefox当前错误地处理了 null 值。与其生成只产生单个静默通道的节点，不然该节点将变得不可用，并且在您尝试将其连接到任何对象时将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Firefox desktop and mobile support it in Gecko 42+ (Windows)/44+, without prefixes, and it can be turned on by flipping the media.webspeech.synth.enabled flag to true in about:config.
trans-unit.target: Firefox桌面和移动设备在Gecko 42+（Windows）/ 44 +中支持它，没有前缀，可以通过在 about:config media.webspeech.synth.enabled 标志翻转为 true 来启用它。

trans-unit.source: Firefox desktop and mobile support it in Gecko 44+, without prefixes, and it can be turned on by flipping the media.webspeech.recognition.enable flag to true in about:config. The permissions settings/UI haven't yet been sorted out however, so permission can't be granted to use it by the user, so it can't be used. This will be fixed soon.
trans-unit.target: Firefox桌面和移动设备在Gecko 44+中支持它，没有前缀，可以通过在 about:config media.webspeech.recognition.enable 标志翻转为 true 来启用它。但是，权限设置/ UI尚未整理，因此用户无法授予使用权限的权限，因此无法使用。这将很快修复。

trans-unit.target: Firefox尚未实现此功能。请参阅相关的错误1102584。

trans-unit.source: Firefox doesn't currently enforce this rule (it did for a while during the development of Firefox 3, but too many sites break when this rule is enforced). We encourage Web developers to fix their code to follow this rule for improved future compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 火狐目前并没有执行这个规则(在开发火狐3的时候有一段时间是执行的,但是有太多的网站在执行这个规则的时候出现了问题)。我们鼓励Web开发者修正他们的代码,使其遵循这一规则,以提高未来的兼容性。

trans-unit.target: Firefox的当前实现：AreWeAnimatedYet

trans-unit.source: Firefox's performance tool allows the developer to record a piece of the user's interaction and the data obtained during the recording is used to create a profile of the browser's activity. The profile includes a waterfall of the activity such as event handling, layout, painting, scripting, etc.
trans-unit.target: Firefox的性能工具允许开发人员记录用户的一部分互动，并且在记录过程中获得的数据用于创建浏览器活动的配置文件。该配置文件包括活动的瀑布，例如事件处理，布局，绘画，脚本编制等。

trans-unit.source: Firefox's performance tool also includes a frame rate graph which provides timestamps for each frame including the average frame rate and the minimum and maximum rates (for a specific recording session). This data, along with the waterfall data, gives an indication of where a site might be having frame related performance problems (for example, by correlating the recording's minimum rates with their respective waterfall events).
trans-unit.target: Firefox的性能工具还包括一个帧速率图，该图为每个帧提供了时间戳，包括平均帧速率以及最小和最大速率（针对特定的录制会话）。该数据与瀑布数据一起，指示站点可能在何处出现与帧相关的性能问题（例如，通过将记录的最小速率与它们各自的瀑布事件相关联）。

trans-unit.source: Fires on a successful call to PresentationRequest.start() or PresentationRequest.join(). This method provides a object with a reference to the created or joined object.
trans-unit.target: 成功调用 PresentationRequest.start() 或 PresentationRequest.join() 时触发。此方法为对象提供对创建或联接的对象的引用。

trans-unit.source: Fires when a database structure change (IDBOpenDBRequest.onupgradeneeded event orIDBFactory.deleteDatabase() was requested elsewhere (most probably in another window/tab on the same computer). This is different from the version change transaction (see IDBVersionChangeEvent), but it is related.
trans-unit.target: 当在其他地方（最有可能在同一台计算机的另一个窗口/选项卡中 IDBFactory.deleteDatabase() 请求数据库结构更改（ IDBOpenDBRequest.onupgradeneeded 事件或IDBFactory.deleteDatabase（））时触发。这与版本更改事务（请参阅 IDBVersionChangeEvent ）不同，但是有关。

trans-unit.source: Fires when access of the database is aborted.
trans-unit.target: 当数据库的访问被中止时发生火灾。

trans-unit.source: Fires when access to the database fails.
trans-unit.target: 当数据库访问失败时触发。

trans-unit.source: Fires when the close event occurs; this happens when the database is unexpectedly closed, such as during application shutdown.
trans-unit.target: 当 close 事件发生时触发；当数据库意外关闭时（例如在应用程序关闭期间），会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Fires when the marquee has finished the amount of scrolling that is set by the loop attribute. It can only fire when the loop attribute is set to some number that is greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: 当marquee完成循环属性设置的滚动量时触发。只有当 loop 属性被设置为大于 0 的数字时,才会触发。

trans-unit.source: Fires when the marquee has reached the end of its scroll position. It can only fire when the behavior attribute is set to alternate.
trans-unit.target: 当选取框到达其滚动位置的末尾时触发。仅当behavior属性设置为 alternate 时才可以触发。

trans-unit.source: Fires when the marquee starts scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 当marquee开始滚动时触发。

trans-unit.source: Firing from privileged code to non-privileged code
trans-unit.target: 从特权代码发射到非特权代码。

trans-unit.source: First check for the existence of the window object reference of such window and if it exists and if it has not been closed, then use the focus() method. There is no other reliable way. You can examine an example explaining how to use the focus() method.
trans-unit.target: 首先检查该窗口的窗口对象引用是否存在，是否存在以及是否尚未关闭，然后使用focus（）方法。没有其他可靠的方法。您可以查看解释如何使用focus（）方法的示例。

trans-unit.source: First introduced in WebKit by Apple for the OS X Dashboard, <canvas> has since been implemented in browsers. Today, all major browsers support it.
trans-unit.target: <canvas> 最初由Apple在OS X仪表板的WebKit中引入，此后已在浏览器中实现。今天，所有主要的浏览器都支持它。

trans-unit.source: First is the array ads. This array contains the data needed to create each ad. We have four here to choose from at random. In a real-world scenario, of course, the ads would come from a database or, more likely, an advertising service from which you fetch ads using an API. However, our needs are simple: each ad is represented by an object with three properties: a background color (bgcolor), a title (title), and a body text string (body).
trans-unit.target: 首先是阵列 ads 。该数组包含制作每个广告所需的数据。我们有四个可供选择的地方。当然，在实际情况中，广告将来自数据库，或者更有可能来自您使用API​​从中获取广告的广告服务。但是，我们的需求很简单：每个广告都由具有三个属性的对象表示：背景色（ bgcolor ），标题（ title ）和正文文本字符串（ body ）。

trans-unit.source: First let's look at the rectangle. There are three functions that draw rectangles on the canvas:
trans-unit.target: 首先我们来看一下矩形。有三个函数可以在画布上绘制矩形。

trans-unit.source: First of all, if the <iframe> is sandboxed, the embedding website needs to add the allow-storage-access-by-user-activationsandbox token to allow storage access requests to be successful, along with allow-scripts and allow-same-origin to allow it to call the API, and execute in an origin that can have cookies:
trans-unit.target: 首先，如果 <iframe> 被沙盒化，则嵌入网站需要添加“ allow-storage-access-by-user-activation 允许存储访问” 沙盒令牌，以使存储访问请求成功，同时 allow-scripts 和 allow-same-origin 允许它调用API，并在可以包含cookie的源中执行：

trans-unit.source: First of all, the server must listen for incoming socket connections using a standard TCP socket. Depending on your platform, this may be handled for you already. For an example, let's assume that your server is listening on example.com, port 8000, and your socket server responds to GET requests on /chat.
trans-unit.target: 首先，服务器必须使用标准TCP套接字监听传入的套接字连接。根据您的平台，可能已经为您解决了。例如，假设您的服务器正在example.com的端口8000上侦听，并且套接字服务器响应 /chat 上的GET请求。

trans-unit.source: First of all, we begin the definition of our rendering loop function — drawVRScene(). The first thing we do inside here is make a call to VRDisplay.requestAnimationFrame() to keep the loop running after it has been called once (this occurred earlier on in our code when we started presenting to the VR display). This call is set as the value of the global vrSceneFrame variable, so we can cancel the loop with a call to VRDisplay.cancelAnimationFrame() once we exit VR presenting.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们开始定义渲染循环函数– drawVRScene() 。我们在这里要做的第一件事是调用 VRDisplay.requestAnimationFrame() 以使循环在被调用一次之后保持运行（这发生在我们的代码中，当我们开始向VR显示器展示时，发生在代码的前面）。此调用被设置为全局 vrSceneFrame 变量的值，因此一旦退出VR呈现，我们可以通过调用 VRDisplay.cancelAnimationFrame() 来取消循环。

trans-unit.source: First of all, we capture references to all the DOM elements involved in the UI, but more interestingly, we capture a reference to Window.speechSynthesis. This is API's entry point — it returns an instance of SpeechSynthesis, the controller interface for web speech synthesis.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们捕获对UI中涉及的所有DOM元素的引用，但更有趣的是，我们捕获对 Window.speechSynthesis 的引用。这是API的入口点-它返回 SpeechSynthesis 实例，Web语音合成的控制器接口。

trans-unit.source: First of all, we store the six different property values obtainable from the VRPose object in their own variables — each one is a Float32Array.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们将从 VRPose 对象获得的六个不同的属性值存储在它们自己的变量中-每个变量都是一个 Float32Array 。

trans-unit.target: 首先，我们将创建周期波。为此，我们需要将实数值和虚数值传递到 BaseAudioContext.createPeriodicWave() 方法中：

trans-unit.target: 初步步骤

trans-unit.source: First take a look at the vertex shader that will move the vertices on the screen:
trans-unit.target: 首先来看一下顶点着色器,它将移动屏幕上的顶点。

trans-unit.source: First there's the window.setInterval(), window.setTimeout(), and window.requestAnimationFrame() functions, which can be used to call a specific function over a set period of time.
trans-unit.target: 首先是 window.setInterval() ， window.setTimeout() 和 window.requestAnimationFrame() 函数，可用于在设定的时间段内调用特定的函数。

trans-unit.source: First up is the addition of the function sendToOneUser(). As the name suggests, this sends a stringified JSON message to a particular username.
trans-unit.target: 首先是添加功能 sendToOneUser() 。顾名思义，这会将字符串化的JSON消息发送到特定的用户名。

trans-unit.source: First we create a video element. We set it to autoplay, mute the sound, and loop the video. We then set up two events to make sure the video is playing and the time has been updated. We need both of these checks because it will produce an error if you upload a video to WebGL that has no data available yet. Checking for both of these events guarantees there is data available and it's safe to start uploading video to a WebGL texture. In the code above, we confirm whether we got both of those events; if so, we set a global variable, copyVideo, to true to indicate that it's safe to start copying the video to a texture.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们创建一个视频元素。我们将其设置为自动播放，静音和循环播放视频。然后，我们设置了两个事件，以确保视频正在播放并且时间已更新。我们需要进行这两项检查，因为如果将视频上传到WebGL尚无可用数据，它将产生错误。检查这两个事件可确保有可用数据，并且可以安全地开始将视频上传到WebGL纹理。在上面的代码中，我们确认是否同时发生了这两个事件。如果是这样，我们将全局变量 copyVideo 设置为true，表示开始将视频复制到纹理是安全的。

trans-unit.source: First we create the <div> to contain the settings bar, so it can be styled as needed. Then we establish a box that will be presented on the left side of the bar and place a label and an <input> element of type "range". The range element will typically be presented as a slider control; we configure it to allow any value between 0.0 and 1.0, stepping by 0.01 each position.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们创建 <div> 来包含设置栏，因此可以根据需要设置其样式。然后，我们建立一个显示在条形图左侧的框，并放置一个标签和一个类型为 "range" 的 <input> 元素。范围元素通常将显示为滑块控件。我们将其配置为允许0.0到1.0之间的任何值，每个位置步进0.01。

trans-unit.source: First we created the <table> element.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们创建了<table>元素。

trans-unit.source: First we have the default constraint sets, as strings. These strings are presented in editable <textarea>s, but this is the initial configuration of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们有默认的约束集，如字符串。这些字符串以可编辑的 <textarea> 表示，但这是流的初始配置。

trans-unit.source: First we need the signaling server itself. WebRTC doesn't specify a transport mechanism for the signaling information. You can use anything you like, from WebSocket to XMLHttpRequest to carrier pigeons to exchange the signaling information between the two peers.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们需要信令服务器本身。WebRTC没有为信令信息指定传输机制。您可以使用任何喜欢的东西，从WebSocket到 XMLHttpRequest 再到信鸽，以在两个对等点之间交换信令信息。

trans-unit.source: First, gl.createProgram() is called to create a new, empty, GLSL program.
trans-unit.target: 首先， gl.createProgram() 创建一个新的，空的GLSL程序。

trans-unit.source: First, scrolledToEnd is set to true if the text in the log is scrolled to the bottom; otherwise it's set to false. We'll use that to determine if we should update the scroll position to ensure that the log stays at the end when we're done adding content to it.
trans-unit.target: 首先，如果将日志中的文本滚动到底部，则scrolledToEnd 设置为 true ;否则，将 scrolledToEnd 设置为true。否则将其设置为 false 。我们将使用它来确定是否应更新滚动位置，以确保在完成向其添加内容后该日志停留在末尾。

trans-unit.source: First, a basic example showing a GainNode having its gain value set. gain is an example of an a-rate AudioParam, as the value can potentially be set differently for each sample frame of the audio.
trans-unit.target: 首先，一个基本示例显示了设置了 gain 值的 GainNode 。 gain 是a速率AudioParam的一个示例，因为可能会为音频的每个样本帧设置不同的值。

trans-unit.source: First, a couple of simple trivial examples, to help explain how the parameters are used:
trans-unit.target: 首先,举几个简单琐碎的例子,帮助解释如何使用参数。

trans-unit.source: First, a new RTCConfiguration is created, restartConfig, specifying the new ICE server and its credentials. This is then passed into setConfiguration(). ICE negotiation is restarted by calling createOffer(), specifying true as the value of the iceRestart option. From there, we handle the process as usual, by setting the local description to the returned offer and then sending that offer to the other peer.
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建一个新的 RTCConfiguration ， restartConfig ，指定新的ICE服务器及其凭据。然后将其传递给 setConfiguration() 。ICE协商通过调用 createOffer() 重新启动，将 iceRestart 选项的值指定为 true 。从那里开始，我们照常处理此过程，方法是将本地描述设置为返回的要约，然后将该要约发送给其他对等方。

trans-unit.source: First, a reference to the content wrapping <main> element is obtained, so we can insert our content into it. Then we set up an event listener for the visibilitychange event. This event is sent when the document becomes hidden or visible, such as when the user switches tabs in their browser. The Intersection Observer API doesn't take this into account when detecting intersection, since intersection isn't affected by page visibility. Therefore, we need to pause our timers while the page is tabbed out; hence this event listener.
trans-unit.target: 首先，获得对内容包装 <main> 元素的引用，因此我们可以将内容插入其中。然后，我们为 visibilitychange 事件设置事件侦听器。当文档变得隐藏或可见时（例如，用户在浏览器中切换选项卡时），将发送此事件。检测交点时，“交点观察器” API不会考虑这一点，因为交点不受页面可见性的影响。因此，我们需要在标签页被选中时暂停计时器；因此，此事件侦听器。

trans-unit.source: First, create a function that takes the text field and a key event as input and determines if any of the limits have been reached. If the limit has not been reached, it will return the key.
trans-unit.target: 首先,创建一个函数,将文本字段和键事件作为输入,并确定是否已达到任何限制。如果没有达到限制,它将返回密钥。

trans-unit.source: First, get a reference to a device by calling MediaDevices.getUserMedia(). The example below simply says give me whatever video device is available, though the getUserMedia() method allows more specific capabilities to be requested. This method returns a Promise that resolves with a MediaStream object.
trans-unit.target: 首先，通过调用 MediaDevices.getUserMedia() 获得对设备的引用。下面的示例只是说给我任何可用的视频设备，尽管 getUserMedia() 方法允许请求更具体的功能。此方法返回使用 MediaStream 对象解析的 Promise 。

trans-unit.source: First, it creates the offer by calling createOffer(). When that succeeds, the offer is passed into setLocalDescription() to set the local description for the connection. Once that's succeeded in turn, the offer can be sent to the signaling server for delivery to the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 首先，它通过调用 createOffer() 创建报价。成功后，该报价将传递到 setLocalDescription() 中以设置连接的本地描述。一旦成功，则可以将报价发送到信令服务器以传递到远程对等方。

trans-unit.source: First, let's build the cube's vertex position buffer by updating the code in initBuffers(). This is pretty much the same as it was for the square plane, but rather longer since there are 24 vertices (4 per side):
trans-unit.target: 首先，让我们通过更新 initBuffers() 中的代码来构建多维数据集的顶点位置缓冲区。这几乎与正方形平面相同，但由于有24个顶点（每侧4个），所以时间更长：

trans-unit.source: First, let's look at the JavaScript code that handles the pointerdown event.
trans-unit.target: 首先，让我们看一下处理 pointerdown 事件的JavaScript代码。

trans-unit.source: First, let's look at the recursive scanFiles() function. This function takes as input a FileSystemEntry representing an entry in the file system to be scanned and processed (the item parameter), and an element into which to insert the list of contents (the container parameter).
trans-unit.target: 首先，让我们看一下递归 scanFiles() 函数。此函数将代表要扫描和处理的文件系统中的条目的 FileSystemEntry （ item 参数）以及要插入内容列表的元素（ container 参数）作为输入。

trans-unit.source: First, let's start by writing a utility function to figure out our orientation vector. The X and Z components are always at a 90° to each other, so we can use the sine and cosine functions, which are offset by the same amount in radians. However, normally this would mean the PannerNode points to the left of the listener at 0° rotation – since `x = cos(0) = 1` and `z = sin(0) = 0`. It's more useful to offset the angle by -90°, which means the PannerNode will point directly at the listener at 0° rotation.
trans-unit.target: 首先，让我们开始编写一个实用函数来找出我们的方向向量。 X和Z分量始终彼此成90°，因此我们可以使用正弦和余弦函数，它们以弧度偏移相同的量。但是，通常这意味着 PannerNode 旋转0° 指向侦听器的左侧 -因为“ x = cos（0）= 1”和“ z = sin（0）= 0”。将角度偏移-90°更为有用，这意味着 PannerNode 将在0°旋转时直接指向侦听器。

trans-unit.source: First, let's take a look at the vertex shader. Its job, as always, is to convert the coordinates we're using for our scene into clipspace coordinates (that is, the system by which (0, 0) is at the center of the context and each axis extends from -1.0 to 1.0 regardless of the actual size of the context).
trans-unit.target: 首先,我们来看看顶点着色器。它的工作一如既往,是将我们在场景中使用的坐标转换为剪贴空间坐标(即(0,0)位于上下文的中心,每个轴从-1.0延伸到1.0的系统,而不管上下文的实际大小)。

trans-unit.source: First, let's take a quick look at the HTML that's needed. There's nothing incredibly complicated here. First, we have a couple of buttons for establishing and closing the connection:
trans-unit.target: 首先，让我们快速看一下所需的HTML。这里没有什么异常复杂的。首先，我们有几个用于建立和关闭连接的按钮：

trans-unit.source: First, perhaps using the tools will save you is a bit too strong but performance tools can certainly help identify code that is not conformant to some expected time threshold. This section briefly describes the web performance tools for the Firefox and Chrome/Canary browsers.
trans-unit.target: 首先，可能使用的工具，将节省您是一个有点过于强烈，但性能工具肯定能帮助我们识别代码是不符合的一些预期的时间阈值。本节简要介绍了Firefox和Chrome / Canary浏览器的Web性能工具。

trans-unit.source: First, the <article> element is created and its ID is set to the unique value nextArticleID (which starts at 1 and goes up for each article). Then we create and append an <h2> element for the article title and then we append the HTML from contents to that. Finally, nextArticleID is incremented (so that the next element gets a new unique ID) and we return the new <article> element to the caller.
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建 <article> 元素，并将其ID设置为唯一值 nextArticleID （从1开始，每篇文章递增）。然后，我们为文章标题创建并添加 <h2> 元素，然后将 contents 的HTML附加到该内容。最后，将 nextArticleID 递增（以便下一个元素获得新的唯一ID），然后将新的 <article> 元素返回给调用方。

trans-unit.target: 首先,HTML。

trans-unit.target: 首先,指定颜色缓冲区的代码不见了,换成了这个。

trans-unit.source: First, the gain nodes are created and configured, and a slider control's value is set to match the gain on the two nodes. Then we create a new ConstantSourceNode and make it the source for the two gain nodes' GainNode.gain values. Each of those values is also an AudioParam.
trans-unit.target: 首先，创建并配置增益节点，并设置滑块控件的值以匹配两个节点上的增益。然后，我们创建一个新的 ConstantSourceNode 并将其用作两个增益节点 GainNode.gain 值的源。这些值中的每一个也是 AudioParam 。

trans-unit.source: First, the global variables. We won't discuss these here; instead, we'll talk about them as they're used in the code to come.
trans-unit.target: 首先,全局变量。我们不会在这里讨论这些变量,而是在接下来的代码中使用它们时再谈。

trans-unit.source: First, the text of the message is fetched from the input box's value attribute. This is then sent to the remote peer by calling sendChannel.send(). That's all there is to it! The rest of this method is just some user experience sugar -- the input box is emptied and re-focused so the user can immediately begin typing another message.
trans-unit.target: 首先，从输入框的 value 属性中获取消息的文本。然后通过调用 sendChannel.send() 将其发送到远程对等方。这里的所有都是它的！此方法的其余部分只是一些用户体验的糖-输入框被清空并重新聚焦，以便用户可以立即开始输入另一条消息。

trans-unit.source: First, this code creates a WebGL buffer into which we'll store the texture coordinates for each face, then we bind that buffer as the array we'll be writing into.
trans-unit.target: 首先,这段代码创建了一个 WebGL 缓冲区,我们将为每个面孔存储纹理坐标,然后我们将该缓冲区绑定为我们要写入的数组。

trans-unit.source: First, we again set up our analyser and data array, then clear the current canvas display with clearRect(). The only difference from before is that we have set the fft size to be much smaller; this is so that each bar in the graph is big enough to actually look like a bar rather than a thin strand.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们再次设置分析器和数据数组，然后使用 clearRect() 清除当前画布显示。与以前唯一的区别是我们将fft的大小设置得小得多；这样，图形中的每个条形图都足够大，以至于实际上看起来像条形图，而不是细线。

trans-unit.source: First, we attach each text node to its parent <td> element using
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们使用以下命令将每个文本节点附加到其父<td>元素

trans-unit.source: First, we call RTCPeerConnection.createOffer() method to create an SDP (Session Description Protocol) blob describing the connection we want to make. This method accepts, optionally, an object with constraints to be met for the connection to meet your needs, such as whether the connection should support audio, video, or both. In our simple example, we don't have any constraints.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们调用 RTCPeerConnection.createOffer() 方法来创建一个SDP（会话描述协议）blob，描述我们要建立的连接。此方法（可选）接受一个对象，该对象具有满足连接要求的约束，例如，连接是否应支持音频，视频或同时支持音频和视频。在我们的简单示例中，我们没有任何约束。

trans-unit.source: First, we create a DocumentFragment object named logFragment if one doesn't currently exist. This element is a pseudo-DOM into which we can insert elements without immediately changing the main DOM itself.
trans-unit.target: 首先，如果当前不存在，则创建一个名为 logFragment 的 DocumentFragment 对象。该元素是伪DOM，我们可以在其中插入元素，而无需立即更改主DOM本身。

trans-unit.source: First, we create a QueryableWorker class that takes the url of the worker, a default listener, and an error handler, and this class is going to keep track of a list of listeners and help us communicate with the worker:
trans-unit.target: 首先,我们创建一个QueryableWorker类,该类需要worker的url、一个默认的监听器和一个错误处理程序,这个类要跟踪监听器的列表,帮助我们与worker通信。

trans-unit.source: First, we create a new Vertex Buffer Object (VBO) and supply it with our array buffer:
trans-unit.target: 首先,我们创建一个新的顶点缓冲对象(VBO),并为其提供数组缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: First, we create space to build the keyboard into. We will be programmatically constructing the keyboard, because doing so gives us the flexibility to configure each key as we determine the appropriate data for the corresponding note. In our case, we get each key's frequency from a table, but it could be calculated algorithmically as well.
trans-unit.target: 首先,我们创建空间来构建键盘。我们将以编程的方式构建键盘,因为这样做可以让我们灵活地配置每个键,因为我们确定了相应音符的适当数据。在我们的案例中,我们从一个表格中获得每个键的频率,但也可以通过算法计算。

trans-unit.source: First, we declare the variables supportedHandlers, which is compatible with PaymentMethodData, and defaultPaymentDetails, which is a PaymentDetailsUpdate object.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们声明变量 supportedHandlers （与 PaymentMethodData 兼容）和 defaultPaymentDetails （这是 PaymentDetailsUpdate 对象）。

trans-unit.source: First, we display a prompt asking the user to name their clip.
trans-unit.target: 首先,我们显示一个提示,要求用户为他们的剪辑命名。

trans-unit.source: First, we draw a red box in the middle, but set W to 0.7. As the coordinates get divided by 0.7 they will all be enlarged.
trans-unit.target: 首先,我们在中间画一个红色的盒子,但是设置W为0.7。当坐标除以0.7时,它们都会被放大。

trans-unit.source: First, we dynamically create the array buffer from JSON data using a DataView. Note the use of true because WebGL expects our data to be in little-endian.
trans-unit.target: 首先，我们使用 DataView 从JSON数据动态创建数组缓冲区。请注意使用 true ,因为WebGL希望我们的数据采用低位字节序。

trans-unit.source: First, we establish global variables.
trans-unit.target: 首先,我们建立全局变量。

trans-unit.source: First, we get a list of all the body elements via
trans-unit.target: 首先,我们通过以下方式获得所有主体元素的列表

trans-unit.source: First, we get access to the window's AudioContext, stashing the reference in context. Then we get references to the control widgets, setting playButton to reference the play button and volumeControl to reference the slider control that the user will use to adjust the gain on the linked pair of oscillators.

trans-unit.target: 首先，当发生与端口的连接时（即，设置了父线程中的 onmessage 事件处理程序，或在父线程中显式调用了 start() 方法时），我们使用了 onconnect 处理程序来触发代码。

trans-unit.source: First, you create the path.
trans-unit.target: 首先,你要创建路径。

trans-unit.source: First, you should take care to always leave your database in a consistent state at the end of every transaction. For example, suppose that you are using IndexedDB to store a list of items that you allow the user to edit. You save the list after the edit by clearing the object store and then writing out the new list. If you clear the object store in one transaction and write the new list in another transaction, there is a danger that the browser will close after the clear but before the write, leaving you with an empty database. To avoid this, you should combine the clear and the write into a single transaction.
trans-unit.target: 首先,你应该注意在每个事务结束时总是让你的数据库处于一致的状态。例如,假设你使用IndexedDB来存储一个允许用户编辑的项目列表。你在编辑后通过清除对象存储来保存列表,然后写出新的列表。如果你在一个事务中清除对象存储,并在另一个事务中写入新的列表,就会出现这样的危险,即浏览器会在清除之后但在写入之前关闭,使你的数据库为空。为了避免这种情况,你应该将清除和写入合并到一个事务中。

trans-unit.source: Firstly, because the hearing range of human ears is roughly 20 Hz to 20,000 Hz. Via the Nyquist–Shannon sampling theorem, the sampling frequency must be greater than twice the maximum frequency one wishes to reproduce. Therefore, the sampling rate has to be greater than 40 kHz.
trans-unit.target: 首先，因为人耳的听力范围大约为20 Hz至20,000 Hz。通过Nyquist–Shannon采样定理，采样频率必须大于一个人希望复制的最大频率的两倍。因此，采样率必须大于40 kHz。

trans-unit.source: For 2-UAs mode device, the receiver page is loaded directly on the presentation device. Controlling user agent communicates with presentation device via supported presentation control protocol, to control the presentation session and to transmit the message between two pages.

trans-unit.target: 对于 SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX ， SVG_TRANSFORM_TRANSLATE 和 SVG_TRANSFORM_SCALE ， angle 将为零。

trans-unit.source: For SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX, the matrix contains the a, b, c, d, e, f values supplied by the user.
trans-unit.target: 对于 SVG_TRANSFORM_MATRIX ，矩阵包含用户提供的a，b，c，d，e，f值。

trans-unit.source: For SVG_TRANSFORM_ROTATE, a, b, c, d, e and f together represent the matrix which will result in the given rotation. When the rotation is around the center point (0, 0), e and f will be zero.
trans-unit.target: 对于 SVG_TRANSFORM_ROTATE ，a，b，c，d，e和f一起表示将导致给定旋转的矩阵。当旋转围绕中心点（0，0）时，e和f将为零。

trans-unit.source: For SVG_TRANSFORM_SCALE, a and d represent the scale amounts (b=0, c=0, e=0 and f=0).
trans-unit.target: 对于 SVG_TRANSFORM_SCALE ，a和d表示比例大小（b = 0，c = 0，e = 0和f = 0）。

trans-unit.source: For SVG_TRANSFORM_SKEWX and SVG_TRANSFORM_SKEWY, a, b, c and d represent the matrix which will result in the given skew (e=0 and f=0).
trans-unit.target: 对于 SVG_TRANSFORM_SKEWX 和 SVG_TRANSFORM_SKEWY ，a，b，c和d表示将导致给定歪斜（e = 0和f = 0）的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: For SVG_TRANSFORM_TRANSLATE, e and f represent the translation amounts (a=1, b=0, c=0 and d=1).
trans-unit.target: 对于 SVG_TRANSFORM_TRANSLATE ，e和f表示转换量（a = 1，b = 0，c = 0和d = 1）。

trans-unit.source: For a more complex but still modular version of it (Daemon) see JavaScript Daemons Management. This more complex version is nothing but a big and scalable collection of methods for the Daemon constructor. However, the Daemon constructor itself is nothing but a clone of MiniDaemon with an added support for init and onstart functions declarable during the instantiation of the daemon. MiniDaemon, because Daemon without its collection of methods is essentially a clone of it.

trans-unit.source: For any data being transmitted over a network, there are size restrictions. At a fundamental level, the individual network packets can't be larger than a certain value (the exact number depends on the network and the transport layer being used). At the application level—that is, within the user agent's implementation of WebRTC on which your code is running—the WebRTC implementation implements features to support messages that are larger than the maximum packet size on the network's transport layer.
trans-unit.target: 对于通过网络传输的任何数据，都有大小限制。从根本上讲，单个网络数据包的大小不能大于某个值（确切的数量取决于网络和所使用的传输层）。在应用程序级别（即在运行代码的用户代理的 WebRTC实施中），WebRTC实施实施功能以支持大于网络传输层上最大数据包大小的消息。

trans-unit.source: For each IntersectionObserverEntry in the list entries, we look to see if the entry's intersectionRatio is going up; if it is, we set the target's background-color to the string in increasingColor (remember, it's "rgba(40, 40, 190, ratio)"), replaces the word "ratio" with the entry's intersectionRatio. The result: not only does the color get changed, but the transparency of the target element changes, too; as the intersection ratio goes down, the background color's alpha value goes down with it, resulting in an element that's more transparent.
trans-unit.target: 对于列表 entries 中的每个 IntersectionObserverEntry ，我们查看该条目的 intersectionRatio 是否上升；如果是，我们将目标的 background-color 设置为 increasingColor 颜色中的字符串（请记住，它是 "rgba(40, 40, 190, ratio)" ），用条目的 intersectionRatio 替换单词“ ratio” 。结果：不仅颜色改变了，目标元素的透明度也改变了；当交叉比例降低时，背景色的Alpha值随之降低，从而使元素更透明。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to be informed every time a target's visibility passes backward or forward through each 25% mark, you would specify the array [0, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1] as the list of thresholds when creating the observer. You can tell which direction the visibility changed in (that is, whether the element became more visible or less visible) by checking the value of the isIntersecting property on the IntersectionObserverEntry passed into the callback function at the time of the visibility change. If isIntersecting is true, the target element has become at least as visible as the threshold that was passed. If it's false, the target is no longer as visible as the given threshold.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您希望每次目标的可见性通过每个25％标记向后或向前移动时都得到通知，则在创建观察者时，可以将数组[0，0.25，0.5，0.75，1]指定为阈值列表。您可以通过在可见性更改时检查传递给回调函数的 IntersectionObserverEntry 上 isIntersecting 属性的值，来确定可见性的变化方向（即，元素变得更可见还是不可见）。如果 isIntersecting 为 true ，则目标元素至少与通过的阈值一样可见。如果为 false ，则目标不再像给定阈值那样可见。

trans-unit.source: For our attack and release, we'll use the linearRampToValueAtTime method as mentioned above. It takes two parameters — the value you want to set the parameter you are changing to (in this case the gain) and when you want to do this. In our case when is controlled by our inputs. So in the example below the gain is being increased to 1, at a linear rate, over the time the attack range input has been set to. Similarly, for our release, the gain is being set to 0, at a linear rate, over the time the release input has been set to.
trans-unit.target: 对于我们的攻击和发布，我们将使用如上所述的 linearRampToValueAtTime 方法。它有两个参数-您要设置要更改为的参数的值（在本例中为增益）以及要执行此操作的时间。在我们的情况下，何时由我们的输入控制。因此，在下面的示例中，在将攻击范围输入设置为一定时间后，增益以线性速率增加到1。类似地，对于我们的释放，在释放输入已设置的时间内，增益以线性速率设置为0。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, browsers do not allow you to run your app from file://. In fact, many of the powerful storage APIs (such as File System, BlobBuilder, and FileReader) throw errors if you run the app locally from file://. When you're just testing your app, and you don't want to set up a web server, you can bypass the security restriction on Chrome. Just start Chrome with the --allow-file-access-from-files flag. Use the flag only for testing purposes.
trans-unit.target: 出于安全原因，浏览器不允许您从 file:// 运行应用程序。实际上，如果您从 file:// 本地运行应用程序，则许多强大的存储API（例如File System，BlobBuilder和FileReader）都会引发错误。当您仅测试应用程序而又不想设置网络服务器时，可以绕过Chrome的安全限制。只需使用 --allow-file-access-from-files 标志启动Chrome 。将该标志仅用于测试目的。

trans-unit.source: For that reason, it is recommended you not use innerHTML when inserting plain text; instead, use Node.textContent. This doesn't parse the passed content as HTML, but instead inserts it as raw text.

trans-unit.source: For the <circle> and the <ellipse> elements, this attribute defines the x-coordinate of the center of the element. If unspecified, the effect is as if the value is set to "0".
trans-unit.target: 对于 <circle> 和 <ellipse> 元素，此属性定义元素中心的x坐标。如果未指定，则效果就像该值设置为“ 0”一样。

trans-unit.source: For the <radialGradient> element, this attribute defines the x-coordinate of the largest (i.e., outermost) circle for the radial gradient. The gradient will be drawn such that 100% gradient stop is mapped to the perimeter of the largest (i.e. outermost) circle. If the attribute is not specified, the effect is as if a value of 50% were set.
trans-unit.target: 对于 <radialGradient> 元素，此属性定义径向渐变的最大（即最外）圆的x坐标。将绘制渐变，以使100％渐变光阑映射到最大（即最外）圆的周长。如果未指定该属性，则效果就像设置了50％的值一样。

trans-unit.source: For the dragenter and dragover events, dropEffect will be initialized based on what action the user is requesting. How this is determined is platform specific, but typically the user can press modifier keys such as the alt key to adjust the desired action. Within event handlers for dragenter and dragover events, dropEffect should be modified if a different action is desired than the action that the user is requesting.
trans-unit.target: 对于 dragenter 和 dragover 事件，将基于用户请求的操作初始化 dropEffect 。如何确定这是特定于平台的，但是通常用户可以按修改键（例如alt键）来调整所需的动作。在 dragenter 和 dragover 事件的事件处理程序中，如果需要与用户请求的动作不同的动作，则应该修改 dropEffect 。

trans-unit.source: For the drop and dragend events, dropEffect will be set to the action that was desired, which will be the value dropEffect had after the last dragenter or dragover event. In a dragend event, for instance, if the desired dropEffect is "move", then the data being dragged should be removed from the source.
trans-unit.target: 对于 drop 和 dragend 事件，将 dropEffect 设置为所需的操作，该操作将是上次 dragenter 或 dragover 事件之后 dropEffect 所具有的值。例如，在 dragend 事件中，如果所需的dropEffect为“ move”，则应从源中删除被拖动的数据。

trans-unit.source: For this section we will put our data into the clip space coordinate system directly. Normally model data is used that is in some arbitrary coordinate system, and is then transformed using a matrix, placing it in the clip space coordinate system. For this example it's easiest to illustrate how clip space works by using values ranging from (-1,-1,-1) to (1,1,1). The code below will create 2 triangles that will draw a square on the screen. The Z depth in the squares determines what gets drawn on top when the squares share the same space. The smaller Z values are rendered on top of the larger Z values.
trans-unit.target: 本节我们将直接把我们的数据放到剪辑空间坐标系中。通常使用的模型数据都是在某个任意坐标系中,然后使用矩阵进行变换,将其放入剪辑空间坐标系中。对于这个例子,最容易说明的是使用从(-1,-1,-1)到(1,1,1)的值来说明剪辑空间的工作原理。下面的代码将创建2个三角形,在屏幕上绘制一个正方形。正方形中的Z深度决定了当这些正方形共享同一空间时,上面会绘制什么。较小的Z值会呈现在较大的Z值之上。

trans-unit.source: From the Position object, we obtain the user's latitude and longitude using position.coords.latitude and position.coords.longitude so we can update the displayed coordinates. The two <span> elements are updated to display the corresponding values after being converted to a value with two decimal places.
trans-unit.target: 从 Position 对象中，我们使用 position.coords.latitude 和 position.coords.longitude 获取用户的纬度和经度，以便更新显示的坐标。在将两个 <span> 元素转换为具有两位小数的值后，将更新以显示相应的值。

trans-unit.source: From the current filter parameter settings this method calculates the frequency response for frequencies specified in the provided array of frequencies.
trans-unit.target: 从当前的滤波器参数设置中,本方法计算出在提供的频率数组中指定频率的频率响应。

trans-unit.source: From this point on, the microphone is re-engaged and the remote user is once again able to hear the local user, as well as speak to them.
trans-unit.target: 从这时起,麦克风被重新启用,远程用户又能听到本地用户的声音,也能和他们说话。

trans-unit.source: From this point onward, events are sent just like any media load.
trans-unit.target: 从这一点上看,事件的发送就像任何媒体负载一样。

trans-unit.source: From this point until disconnect() is called, callback() will be called each time an element is added to or removed from the DOM tree rooted at targetNode, or any of those elements' attributes are changed.
trans-unit.target: 从这一点开始，直到调用 targetNode disconnect() 为止，每次将元素添加到以targetNode为根的DOM树中或从中删除元素时，都会调用 callback() ，或者更改任何这些元素的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gecko 1.9.2 note Starting in Gecko 1.9.2 (Firefox 3.6), overriding the position of a window using window features will not change the persisted values saved by the session store feature. That means the next time the window is opened, it will still open in the saved location.
trans-unit.target: Gecko 1.9.2注意 从Gecko 1.9.2(Firefox 3.6)开始,使用窗口功能覆盖窗口的位置不会改变会话存储功能保存的持久值。这意味着下次打开窗口时,仍然会在保存的位置打开。

trans-unit.source: Gecko 11.0 (Firefox 11.0 / Thunderbird 11.0 / SeaMonkey 2.8) now allows SVG-as-an-image to be drawn into a canvas without tainting the canvas.
trans-unit.target: Gecko 11.0（Firefox 11.0 / Thunderbird 11.0 / SeaMonkey 2.8）现在允许将SVG即图像绘制到画布中，而不会污染画布。

trans-unit.source: Gecko 2.0 (Firefox 4 / Thunderbird 3.3 / SeaMonkey 2.1) introduces support for the DOM window.URL.createObjectURL() and window.URL.revokeObjectURL() methods. These let you create simple URL strings that can be used to reference any data that can be referred to using a DOM File object, including local files on the user's computer.
trans-unit.target: Gecko 2.0（Firefox 4 / Thunderbird 3.3 / SeaMonkey 2.1）引入了对DOM window.URL.createObjectURL() 和 window.URL.revokeObjectURL() 方法的支持。这些使您可以创建简单的URL字符串，这些字符串可用于引用使用DOM File 对象可以引用的任何数据，包括用户计算机上的本地文件。

trans-unit.source: Gecko-based browsers insert text nodes into a document to represent whitespace in the source markup. Therefore a node obtained, for example, using Node.firstChild or Node.previousSibling may refer to a whitespace text node rather than the actual element the author intended to get.
trans-unit.target: 基于Gecko的浏览器将文本节点插入文档中，以表示源标记中的空白。因此，例如使用 Node.firstChild 或 Node.previousSibling 获得的节点可以引用空白文本节点，而不是作者打算获取的实际元素。

trans-unit.source: Get a reference to an HTMLImageElement object or to another canvas element as a source. It is also possible to use images by providing a URL.

trans-unit.source: Gets a ServiceWorkerRegistration object whose scope matches the provided document URL. If the method can't return a ServiceWorkerRegistration, it returns a Promise.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 ServiceWorkerRegistration 对象，该对象的范围与提供的文档URL相匹配。如果方法无法返回 ServiceWorkerRegistration ，则返回 Promise 。

trans-unit.source: Gets an item from the options collection for this <select> element. You can also access an item by specifying the index in array-style brackets or parentheses, without calling this method explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 从选项集合中为此 <select> 元素获取一个项目。您也可以通过在数组样式的括号或括号中指定索引来访问项目，而无需显式调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the AnimationEffectReadOnly associated with this animation. This will usually be a KeyframeEffect object.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置与此动画关联的 AnimationEffectReadOnly 。这通常是一个 KeyframeEffect 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the String used to identify the animation.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置用于标识动画的 String 。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the URL of an external script. It reflects the src attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置外部脚本的URL。它反映了 src 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the composite operation property for resolving the property value changes between this and other keyframe effects.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置复合操作属性,用于解析该效果与其他关键帧效果之间的属性值变化。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the duration of the current media being presented.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置当前媒体的播放时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the element or pseudo-element being animated by this object. This may be null for animations that do not target a specific element.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置由此对象设置动画的元素或伪元素。这可能是 null 的不针对特定元素的动画。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the event handler for the cancel event.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置 cancel 事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the event handler for the finish event.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置 finish 事件的事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the iteration composite operation for resolving the property value changes of this keyframe effect.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置迭代复合操作,用于解析该关键帧效果的属性值变化。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the language of the utterance.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置语句的语言。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the pitch at which the utterance will be spoken at.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置说话时的音调。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the speed at which the utterance will be spoken at.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置说话的速度。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the text that will be synthesised when the utterance is spoken.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置语句说出来后要合成的文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the voice that will be used to speak the utterance.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置将用于说该语句的声音。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the volume that the utterance will be spoken at.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置该语句的音量。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the z-depth defining the far plane of the eye view frustum, i.e. the furthest viewable boundary of the scene.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置z深度，该深度定义了视锥台的远平面，即场景的最远可视边界。

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the z-depth defining the near plane of the eye view frustum, i.e. the nearest viewable boundary of the scene.
trans-unit.target: 获取并设置z深度，该深度定义了视锥台的近平面，即场景的最近可见边界。

trans-unit.source: Gets computed style for the specified element. Computed style indicates the computed values of all CSS properties of the element.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定元素的计算样式。计算出的样式表示该元素所有CSS属性的计算值。

trans-unit.source: Gets default computed style for the specified element, ignoring author stylesheets.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定元素的默认计算样式,忽略作者样式表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the timeline associated with this animation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与此动画关联的 timeline 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current value of this AudioParam. Initially, the value is set to AudioParam.defaultValue. Part of the Web Audio API.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此 AudioParam 的当前 value 。最初，该值设置为 AudioParam.defaultValue 。在部分网络音频API。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a meta-data property to define for a document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要为文档定义的元数据属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a scheme used to interpret the value of a meta-data property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于解释元数据属性值的方案名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of an HTTP response header to define for a document.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要为文档定义的HTTP响应头的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the playback rate of the animation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置动画的播放速率。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scheduled time when an animation's playback should begin.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置动画播放开始的预定时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of meta-data property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置元数据属性的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a video element is flipped horizontally in the display.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置视频元素是否在显示屏上水平翻转。

trans-unit.source: Gets the arguments passed to the window (if it's a dialog box) at the time window.showModalDialog() was called. This is an nsIArray.
trans-unit.target: 获取在调用 window.showModalDialog() 时传递给窗口（如果是对话框）的参数。这是一个 nsIArray 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the bit depth of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 获取屏幕的位深。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the content area of the browser window including, if rendered, the horizontal scrollbar.
trans-unit.target: 获取浏览器窗口内容区域的高度,包括水平滚动条(如果已渲染)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the height of the outside of the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 获取浏览器窗口外部的高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the item in the options collection with the specified name. The name string can match either the id or the name attribute of an option node. You can also access an item by specifying the name in array-style brackets or parentheses, without calling this method explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有指定名称的选项集合中的项目。名称字符串可以匹配选项节点的 id 或 name 属性。您也可以通过在数组样式的括号或括号中指定名称来访问项目，而无需显式调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the stream which is the communication channel. Both sides of the channel have reading and writing capability.
trans-unit.target: 获取作为通信通道的流。通道的两边都有读写能力。

trans-unit.source: Gets the textual representation of the selector for this rule, e.g. "h1,h2".
trans-unit.target: 获取此规则的选择器的文本表示形式，例如 "h1,h2" 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of drag-and-drop operation currently selected or sets the operation to a new type. The value must be none, copy, link or move.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前选定的拖放操作的类型或将操作设置为新的类型。该值必须为 none ， copy ， link 或 move 。

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the content area of the browser window including, if rendered, the vertical scrollbar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the width of the outside of the browser window.
trans-unit.target: 获取浏览器窗口外侧的宽度。

trans-unit.target: 获取/设置文档的方向性(rtl/ltr)。

trans-unit.source: Gets/sets the ability to edit the whole document.
trans-unit.target: 获取/设置编辑整个文档的能力。

trans-unit.target: 获取/设置当前文档的背景色。
